Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "How to build the open xml?" (#522) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi
For one of my projects I want to embedd the open xml into one of my dlls . I started downloading master Open xml from below address: https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK And tried to build it first, but to my dismay its saying The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found

I have looked at below address and I saw I have installed these .net cores: C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk

1.0.0, 1.1.9, 1.1.10, 2.0.2, 2.1.2, 2.1.201, 2.1.202, 2.1.400, 2.1.401

In the cs project its written netstandard1.3 is needed. But I can not find this package on microsoft website.

Do you know how I can build OpenXml?

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Page breaks not converted from Docx to HTML" (#248) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody:
Page breaks are currently not supported in Docx to Html

I added a Pull Request ( https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools/pull/246 ) to fix this.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Update ChartUpdater.cs" (#247) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody:
UpdateChart.UpdateChart.UpdateSeries does not work on Radar chart types, it is a simple one line fix that I have used for a few years now.
Closes OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools#245

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Process page breaks" (#246) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Opened issue "ChartUpdater does not update series in Radar chart type" (#245) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody: When you are using Open Xml PowerTools to add data to a chart using ChartUpdater, a Radar chart type will not get updated. It is simply not in the list of chart types that the updater checks for. I am sending a pr with a fix for it.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Tests fail because of OxPt.PbTests.PB006_VideoFormats on .Net Core" (#244) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody:
Error : 
> [xUnit.net 00:00:04.23] OxPt.PbTests.PB006_VideoFormats [FAIL]
> System.IO.IOException : Entries cannot be opened multiple times in Update mode.

Discussion here, 
https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools/pull/238#issuecomment-411069902

This is a bug in .net Core 2.0 runtime : https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/26952

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Document with justified and left aligned text is incorrectly formatted when converting to html" (#243) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody:
Minimum markup for which conversation fails:

    xmlns:wps="http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2010/wordprocessingShape" mc:Ignorable="w14 w15 w16se w16cid wp14">
    <w:body>
        <w:p w14:paraId="4F76327E" w14:textId="07E7AA7B" w:rsidR="007145F2" w:rsidRDefault="0013176D" w:rsidP="0073348A">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:ind w:left="-570"/>
                <w:jc w:val="both"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial"/>
                    <w:color w:val="222222"/>
                    <w:shd w:val="clear" w:color="auto" w:fill="FFFFFF"/>

            </w:r>

                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial"/>
                    <w:color w:val="222222"/>
                    <w:shd w:val="clear" w:color="auto" w:fill="FFFFFF"/>
                    <w:lang w:val="nl-BE" w:eastAsia="nl-BE" w:bidi="nl-BE"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"></w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w14:paraId="60D946B7" w14:textId="1C4DE7A7" w:rsidR="0073348A" w:rsidRPr="0073348A" w:rsidRDefault="0073348A" w:rsidP="005119DD">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:ind w:hanging="570"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:lang w:val="fr-FR"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:proofErr w:type="spellStart"/>

        <w:sectPr w:rsidR="0073348A" w:rsidRPr="0073348A">
